feed.title: Gladys Assistant Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.55.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Dashboard Chart: Fix missing device feature unit when editing a chart by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2246
  • Chat: Enable switch control via user commands by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2247
  • Redirect German users to English documentation by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2249
  • Increase camera image resolution to 1280px by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2248
  • CallMeBot integration for WhatsApp & Signal messages by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2250
  • Scene: Add condition "If... Then... Else..." by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2239

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.54.0...v4.55.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.55.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Scene: Fix crash on start scene action by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2251

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.55.0...v4.55.1

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.55.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Scene: Fix variables in action http request by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2253

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.55.1...v4.55.2

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.56.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(z2m): Add Tuya Rain by @cicoub13 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2241
  • Gladys Plus : Faster load time + get message if the instance is disconnected by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2252
  • Fix "undefined" on some screens during slow load by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2258
  • fix: Netatmo service to replace axios with undici for HTTP requests by @Terdious in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2256
  • House.arm : Fix flaky test by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2263

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.55.2...v4.56.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.56.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "Gladys Plus : Faster load time + get message if the instance is disconnected" by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.56.0...v4.56.1
